xuiCode
directive in module xui

Description

Purpose of this component is to format and colorize your source code snippets. Code content has to be passed in as an attribute content as using transclusion is not white-space and new-line friendly. Optionally you can specify a programming language to be used for highlighting, otherwise an automated detection will be used. This directive is encapsulating Highlight.js library.

Usage

as element:
<xui-code
       content="{string}"
       [lang="{string}"]>
</xui-code>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
contentstring

The source code to be displayed.

lang
(optional)
string

Programming language used (auto-detect if not present) - see https://highlightjs.org/static/demo/ for possible values.
